entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued August 15 at 3:54PM PDT by NWS

entry.cap:areaDesc: Chelan; Okanogan

entry.title: Fire Weather Watch issued August 15 at 2:12PM PDT until August 18 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Gusty winds and dry conditions Thursday and Friday... .The ridge responsible for the current heat wave will begin to break down Thursday and weaken considerably Friday with the passage of a dry cold front. It will remain very hot and dry on Thursday with a noticeable increase in west to southwest winds Thursday afternoon and into the evening. Temperatures will cool

entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ADVISORY FOR SMOG REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PDT THURSDAY... entry.title: Beach Hazards Statement issued August 16 at 2:41AM CDT until August 17 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Life threatening waves of 3 to 6 feet and dangerous currents are expected. * WHERE...Sheboygan and Ozaukee Counties. * WHEN...From this afternoon through Thursday morning.
